verses.name: Psalms 141:1
verses.text: Lord, I cry unto thee: make haste unto me; give ear unto my voice, when I cry unto thee.

verses.name: Psalms 141:2
verses.text: Let my prayer be set forth before thee as incense; and the lifting up of my hands as the evening sacrifice.

verses.name: Psalms 141:3
verses.text: Set a watch, O Lord, before my mouth; keep the door of my lips.

verses.name: Psalms 141:4
verses.text: Incline not my heart to any evil thing, to practise wicked works with men that work iniquity: and let me not eat of their dainties.

verses.name: Psalms 141:5
verses.text: Let the righteous smite me; it shall be a kindness: and let him reprove me; it shall be an excellent oil, which shall not break my head: for yet my prayer also shall be in their calamities.

verses.name: Psalms 141:6
verses.text: When their judges are overthrown in stony places, they shall hear my words; for they are sweet.

verses.name: Psalms 141:7
verses.text: Our bones are scattered at the grave’s mouth, as when one cutteth and cleaveth wood upon the earth.

verses.name: Psalms 141:8
verses.text: But mine eyes are unto thee, O God the Lord: in thee is my trust; leave not my soul destitute.

verses.name: Psalms 141:9
verses.text: Keep me from the snares which they have laid for me, and the gins of the workers of iniquity.

verses.name: Psalms 141:10
verses.text: Let the wicked fall into their own nets, whilst that I withal escape.
